posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked:
Today, we’re releasing version 7.88 to beta. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group!

Release notes:

  • Polls now include additional accessibility labels for improved VoiceOver support.

Liquid Glass

We’ve got a new wave of Liquid Glass updates in this release, which we’d love you to test out. These include:

  • A redesigned sticker picker

  • Updated designs for in-chat banners, such as pending group request banner and duplicate name banner

  • An updated location sharing screen

  • Visual improvements on iPad

  • Minor updates to the media viewer with more to come

  • Fixes and improvements to VoiceOver and accessibility

When reporting issues, please include which iOS 26 version you’re running – 26.0, 26.1, and 26.2 all had different known issues on Apple’s side.

Backups

Backups is now available in production as well as TestFlight, but your early feedback is still crucial for us as we roll this out to a broader audience.

Please continue to report any issues you encounter!

When reporting issues, please include debug logs and screenshots if applicable; if you’re experiencing a crash, please also include .ips files. Instructions can be found here.

Thank you all, as always, for helping us improve Signal!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.87 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.88.0.1227-beta

90 new commits since 7.87.0.1210-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.88 [1]

  • better voiceover support for polls [2]

  • Asyncify UsernameQuerier, use ActionSheetDisplayableError [3]

  • Fix broken toolbar layout on iOS 26 for RTL languages. [4]

  • Fix layout for voice note recording lock indicator. [5]

  • Back off for 429s from TestFlight subscription redemption [6]

  • Adjust string for Contact Permissions view button [7]

  • Poll bar animations are jittery [8]

  • Pass through CancellationErrors in ListMediaManager [9]

  • Remove storyAuthorAddress from TSMessage [10]

  • Limit width of sidebar on iPad. [11]

  • Add Cron [12]

  • Use Cron for periodic message send log cleanup [13]

  • Use Cron for periodic view once cleanup [14]

  • Use Cron for periodic username check [15]

  • Use Cron for periodic group refreshes [16]

  • Use Cron for periodic subscription config update [17]

  • Use Cron for periodic sender certificate fetches [18]

  • Use Cron for periodic inactive device update [19]

  • Use Cron for periodic profile refreshes [20]

  • Use Cron for periodic local profile update [21]

  • Allow poll votes in admin only chats [22]

  • Remove owsFailDebug around missing input toolbar [23]

  • Use Cron for periodic emoji search update [24]

  • Use Cron for periodic remote megaphone updates [25]

  • Use Cron for periodic orphaned data check [26]

  • Use Cron for periodic account attributes update [27]

  • Use Cron for periodic backup refresh [28]

  • Bump libsignal to v0.86.4, add missing backup settings exports [29]

  • Fix typo causing one avatar being missing in name collision banner in chat. [30]

  • Clean up StorageService.StorageError [31]

  • Move isViewOnce off of SignalAttachment [32]

  • Pass approved attachments directly to send method [33]

  • Remove SignalAttachment.isConvertible… properties [34]

  • Don’t parallelize segmenting videos [35]

  • Fix share extension handling of oversize text [36]

  • Remove false positive assertion [37]

  • Use UTType.plainText for super-oversized messages [38]

  • Remove unused SignalAttachment text methods [39]

  • Update Name collision resolution screen. [40]

  • Do not show empty glass panel in chat search UI. [41]

  • Isolate and simplify iOS 15 edit-menu handling [42]

  • Use UIEditMenuInteraction to prioritize the Format menu on iOS 16+ [43]

  • Redesigned "Join Group?" prompt. [44]

  • Throw OWSHTTPError for unexpected status codes [45]

  • Don’t inherit from NSObject in SignalAttachment [46]

  • Pinned message banners [47]

  • Sticker picker redesign. […] [48]

  • Receive support for pinning/unpinning messages [49]

  • Use Cron for periodic Storage Service refresh [50]

  • UI to pin or unpin a message [51]

  • Pinned message details view [52]

  • Update navigation bar controls in media viewer for iOS 26. […] [53]

  • Remove unused unfrontedBaseUrl. [54]

  • Fix UI misconfiguration when joining a group via link. [55]

  • Use Cron to sync the block list if necessary [56]

  • Don't offer to contact support for network errors during Backup restore [57]

  • Do not show info message when unblurring group avatar [58]

  • Avoid super.canPerformAction for paste(_:) [59]

  • Make ConversationPicker attachments non-Optional [60]

  • Remove unused attachments code [61]

  • Remove unused copyToVideoTempDir method [62]

  • Remove DataSource.isValidVideo [63]

  • Remove DataSource.isValidImage [64]

  • Add images to format-menu options [65]

  • Remove deprecated device transfer bits [66]

  • Remove stories code that’s no longer necessary [67]

  • Remove DataSource.imageMetadata & friends [68]

  • Stop using typed throws in AppAttestManager [69]

  • Fix mob archive/restore formatting [70]

  • Go to message support for pinned messages [71]

  • Fixes/improvements for ConversationHeaderView. […] [72] (reverted by [73])

  • Revert "Fixes/improvements for ConversationHeaderView." [73] (reverts [72])

  • Improvements to title view in media viewer. [74]

  • Fixes/improvements for ConversationHeaderView. […] [75]

  • Add call summary support for all calls [76]

  • [IOS-6509] Fix chat settings header buttons not available for VoiceOver. [77]

  • Fine tune position of the navigation bar in media viewer. [78]

  • Remove outdated TODO [79]

  • Fix share extension theme not updating on system appearance change [80]

  • Clean up Share Extension theme override management [81]

  • Temporarly restore CVC device transfer listener for iPads [82]

  • Run and log an extra reachability check on app launch [83]

  • VoiceOver improvements in Registration flow. [84]

  • Remove Contact Support option for BackupIAPNotFoundLocally [85]

  • Update Backups integration test cases [86]

  • Update syntax to match nearby code. [87]

  • Always consider "no Backup in 7d" as a failure [88]

  • Update release notes [89]

  • Update translations [90]

Gathered from signalapp/Signal-iOS 7.87.0.1210-beta…7.88.0.1227-beta

Localization changes

No localization changes fit in character limit. You can view the full comparison to 7.87.0.1210-beta so far here. Localization changes for the release are the same, as this is the first build of the release.
The keyboard bug I reported earlier seems to have been fixed with this build. Thanks!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.92 release

posts.cooked: Are there any downsides to using the same value for both my Signal PIN and my Signal Backup Recovery Key? I’m considering setting them to match for convenience, but I’m unsure if this reduces security or creates other risks.

Hoping that the following commit might solve my inability to perform backup and link and sync:

github.com/signalapp/Signal-iOS

Fix mob archive/restore formatting

committed 07:41PM - 02 Dec 25 UTC
pete-signal
+45 -33

There’s also an issue on GitHub for this (not mine):

github.com/signalapp/Signal-iOS

Backup validation fails: payment: "amountMob" was not parsable

opened 07:38AM - 25 Nov 25 UTC
maxsz

- [x] I have searched open and closed issues for duplicates - [x] I am submittin…g a bug report for existing functionality that does not work as intended - [x] This isn't a feature request or a discussion topic ---------------------------------------- ### Bug description Backup on iOS fails with `ERR❤️ [BackupSettingsViewController:254 startExternalEventObservation]: Failed to perform manual backup! backupError(SignalServiceKit.BackupValidationError.validationFailed(message: "chat frame ChatId(77) error: chat item 1709813404656: payment: \"amountMob\" was not parsable", unknownFields: []))` ### Steps to reproduce - (I guess setup payments?) - Go to Settings -> Backup - Run backup now **Actual result:** Backup fails with error message, log attached. **Expected result:** Backup should work. ### Screenshots <img width="660" height="1434" alt="Image" src="https://github.com/user-attachments/assets/b9fc3029-b8a1-44d5-b3dd-73eccacdd193" /> ### Device info **Device**: iPhone 16 Pro Max **iOS version**: 26.1 **Signal version:** 7.86.2 (1206) AppStore ### Link to debug log [2025.11.25 05.59.57 5D7AF45B-41C3-4E38-AE2E-88E690FC284E.zip](https://github.com/user-attachments/files/23741153/2025.11.25.05.59.57.5D7AF45B-41C3-4E38-AE2E-88E690FC284E.zip)

I do, however, have an open case with support (and they have my debug logs, details and screenshots). Unfortunately, I won’t be able to test this until it hits production, but if this is an attempt at a fix, I will report back to support whether it works or not in about a week’s time

link_counts.title: Fix mob archive/restore formatting · signalapp/Signal-iOS@1aeb841 · GitHub
Backup validation fails: payment: "amountMob" was not parsable · Issue #6160 · signalapp/Signal-iOS · GitHub

posts.cooked:
Backups are failing for me as well.
I have the same issue as @Lkunited :

2025/12/06 09:49:46:593  ERR❤️ [BackupArchiveManagerImpl:1520 validateEncryptedBackup]: [Backups] Backup validation unknown error: unknownFields(["in frame 1, item.account.accountSettings has unknown field with tag 22"])
2025/12/06 09:49:46:594  ERR❤️ [BackupSettingsViewController:253 startExternalEventObservation]: Failed to perform manual backup! backupError(SignalServiceKit.BackupValidationError.unknownError)

posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked:
mangold:

2025/12/06 09:49:46:593 ERR❤️ [BackupArchiveManagerImpl:1520 validateEncryptedBackup]: [Backups] Backup validation unknown error: unknownFields(["in frame 1, item.account.accountSettings has unknown field with tag 22"])

Sorry about this backup failure, all. There was some internal miscommunication and we removed a field that was storing the “allow sealed sender from anyone” setting, which is what’s going on here. We’ll get a fix out as soon as possible.
In the meantime, disabling that option made the backup work for me.

posts.name: Sasha Weiss
posts.cooked: This is now fixed in beta build 1237. Thanks again for your patience, and sorry about those failures!

New Version: 7.88.0.1237-beta

5 new commits since 7.88.0.1227-beta:

  • Image and string tweak for Remove Formatting [1]

  • Stop setting field that LibSignal doesn't recognize anymore [2]

  • Fix crash when enabling Backups and not registered [3]

  • Consistently log BackupExportJob errors, remove typed throws [4]

  • Update translations [5]

Thank your for the quick fix! Works again for me.
Now that 7.88 is in production, I can confirm this issue is resolved for me. Thank you so much!

Beta testing for this release has concluded. If you find any further bugs related to this release or earlier releases, please report them on GitHub (read How to Report Bugs for more information on how to do that).

If you have feedback specifically related to the new beta version, please post it in the following topic: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.89 release.
